values.text: Come visit us in the heart of downtown Toronto at our Corporate Headquarters. We're located in: Corus

Come visit us in the heart of downtown Toronto at our Corporate Headquarters. To get to our business at the 25 Dockside Drive (Corus), walk to Artscape Head Office and take the left turn to Dockside Drive.
Come visit us in the heart of downtown Toronto at our Corporate Headquarters. We're located on 25 Dockside Drive, Suite 700, Toronto (ON M5A 0B5), Ontario, Canada

Our customer support
We back our products and services with support from our team of experts. If you need assistance, you can connect with our Customer Support Team at ecobee’s Toronto office.

Monday–Friday: 9am to 10pm EST
Saturday–Sunday: 10am to 9pm EST

support"@"ecobee.com

values.text: If you fall victim to online fraud, please contact our security team when sending us sensitive information. We take security very seriously and investigate all reported vulnerabilities.

dialog_nodes.title: I want to make an appointment
Please transfer me to an agent

values: Would you like me to transfer you to a representative?

values.text: Thank you for your kind words of appreciation. Keep the love coming!
That's lovely to hear, We wish you a wonderful day. ☀️
We're happy to hear that you're pleased with the Ecobee. Thank you for sharing your thoughts. We wish you a pleasant day. :-)
We are glad that you find our products to be good, Have a lovely weekend, and stay safe. 💖

We always strive to provide excellent customer service and we are happy to hear that we did. If you need any help in the future, please do not hesitate to contact us. We hope that you have a great day.

We are delighted to hear this. Such positive feedback motivates us to do even better.          
Thank you & stay safe!
Your happiness keeps us encouraging to continue providing the best services. We are glad to receive your positive remark.

Thank you for your appreciation, we are glad that we could satisfy you with our service experience in such times of need and obliged that you took the time to share back. We are really happy to hear this.

We are overwhelmed to receive such positive feedback & our equally proud to have customers like you as a part of our family.
We usually share our happy customer experiences & appreciation with our internal teams and external customers and trust you don't mind us doing so! Thank you and stay safe.

We are so glad to hear about your satisfactory experience with your product and are thankful that you took the time to share your feedback. This means a lot. Thank you have a great evening & stay safe!
I'm glad to hear this. Your feedback is really valuable and I have shared the same with my team. Thank you. Have a great day ahead & stay safe.
We are so glad to hear this. It is reviews like this and customers like you who helps us become stronger each day.
Hi there, thank you so much for taking the time to reach out and provide feedback on your ecobee products. I'm glad to hear you've been enjoying your ecobee for so long,
Hi! Happy to hear you love your ecobee. Thanks for joining the hive.
Thanks for sharing your feedback with us. Your love is all we need. Have an awesome day! :D
W're overjoyed to recieve your compliments and appreciation.😍
We always aim to deliver a great experience to our customers and are glad to know that you liked it. Wish that you have a positive experience with us in the future too.
Nothing exhilarates us more than listening to our customer's happy experiences. Hope that our bond remains stronger by the passing years.
Thank you for your awesome response. We work hard to meet our customer expectations and it makes us happy when it hit up to the mark.
I'm good, how are you?
I only speak English
I don't share personal information on the internet
I'm not telling
Do you have a crush on me?
I am here to talk with you.
Hello, I’m ecobee virtual assistant
I would be happy to stay with you.

Hi there, Thank you for reaching out to us. We're happy to hear that you're interested. We would like to see how we can help, but we need some more information to be able to do that. Can you let us know which products you're interested in? We'll be awaiting your reply.

generic.title: Please select product to assist you better

options.label: Please select product to assist you betCertified Refurbished ecobee3 lite

values.text: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field.
What kind of music do planets like? Neptunes.
Why do bees have sticky hair? Because they use honeycombs.
What do you call birds that stick together? Vel-crows.
What did the tomato say to the other tomato during a race? Ketchup.
How did the barber win the race? He knew a shortcut.
What has four wheels and flies? A garbage truck.
What did the elevator say when it sneezed? I think I’m coming down with something.
What do you call shoes made of banana peels? Slippers.
Why were the fish’s grades so bad? It was below sea level.
I told my doctor that I broke my arm in two places.  He told me to stop going to those places.
This is my step ladder. I never knew my real ladder.
We certainly want you to have the best experience with us. Rest assured, we shall get in touch with you shortly with an update on this.

Hi there, sorry to hear that your issue has not been resolved yet. Do you by any chance have a reference number by which we can track your complain? Please let us know. We would love to help you with this. Hope to hear from you soon.
Please let me know whether your issue is resolved or you need additional help.
Hey there, our support team will surely connect with you soon and resolve the issues at the earliest.

I understand your concerns and frustration
Please provide the below information and I will escalate your case to ecobee's Regional Escalation Team
First Name:
Last name:
Country:
Case Number:
Email address:
Telephone Number:
Alt Tel No:
ecobee Product Number:
Product Serial Number:
Description of the issue:
Thank you
- ecobee Tech Support

Firstly apologies for all the inconvenience. I'll action this right away without much delay. We will work on this issue together to sort it out.
I hope this helps! Keep me posted.
Thanks!
- ecobee Tech Support

Hi there, we regret that we could not provide you with a resolution to your satisfaction. If you change your mind and would like to accept the offer that was previously made, please contact us back at your convenience.

Hi there, your annoyance with reminders and alerts is definitely not the sentiment we want you to feel. You are able to control which alerts you receive within Preferences - find out more here: https://bit.ly/2zZ2aMk
In terms of the update app experience, I will be sure to share your input with the dev team to take into consideration while creating future iterations. If you need any more assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. Always happy to help!
Come visit us in the heart of downtown Toronto at our Corporate Headquarters. We're located on 25 Dockside Drive, Suite 700, Toronto (ON M5A 0B5), Ontario, Canada
Come visit us in the heart of downtown Toronto at our Corporate Headquarters. We're located in: Corus

Come visit us in the heart of downtown Toronto at our Corporate Headquarters. To get to our business at the 25 Dockside Drive (Corus), walk to Artscape Head Office and take the left turn to Dockside Drive.
I didn't understand can you please try again later.

We're extremely sorry about the delay. Due to the current peak hours, we're seeing an influx of customers coming in for support and we are working with reduced work force and limited infrastructure to support our customers. Please rest assure that your concern will be addressed by us as soon as possible.
We are sorry for the delay. This is a busy time of the year for us. We ship customers order out in the order we receive them. We apologize for not having any additional information at this time.
Hi! We're sorry if you feel that way. Is there any way we can assist you? Thanks.
We apologize for the inconvenience,we requesting you to please visit to your nearest service center for better assistant.
We are truly sorry that we have lost favor with you. If there is ever an opportunity for Ecobee to regain your loyalty, please do not hesitate to let us know.
I am extremely sorry to hear about your experience and would like to take this opportunity to resolve your complaint.
We never want our customers to feel bad about us. We have already forwarded your issue to our concerned team. Trust us, we'll give our best to sort this out.
We would like to inform you that we are working rigorously to find a solution to your issue and we'll share an update soon.
We are sorry for the unpleasant experience. Please give us a chance to make it right for you, we'll connect with you soon.

Hi there, we understand the emotions of our users, our team is working towards giving Ecobee users a better experience with their devices and will continue to do the same. We request you to understand the process and stay tuned to our Official channels in the meantime
Apologies for the inconvenience faced. We will have this looked into. Your remarks have been noted and shared with the concerned team. You will be contacted soon in this regard.

No, I am not a human.

Hi there, that is definitely not the experience we want you to have. Thanks for your sharing feedback, lets look into your issue together in more detail. Please DM us with your email, serial number, and a description of the situation at hand. Always happy to help!
I can tell you about our store locations and opening hours, or help you set up an appointment.
You could also ask me to connect you to an agent.
